title: ***FREE APP***DOG PARK, POOL, GYM, CLUB HOUSE, DECK, NEAR DINING
posting_body: ** Free Application** 1 Bd + Den, Enjoy Luxury Living, W/D, COMM.
Park77 is luxury living at it's best.
These exclusive, sought after apartments have many interior upgrades.
We provide stunning quartz counter tops, upgraded wood work, hardwood surfaces and much more.
This brand new community offers park like living with a stunning community garden.
The little ones can enjoy the afternoon playing on the playground, while you prepare your meal in the outdoor BBQ area.
Get your exercise walking around our extensive walking trails and just taking in nature.
Your dogs will enjoy our enclosed BARK77, dog park.
During the summer, indulge in a dip in our refreshing out door pool.
The cabana can be used year round and even rented out for your private parties.
We provide a state of the art exercise room to keep your family in peak shape.
If your car is your baby, protect it under our covered parking.
Arlington is a picturesque community 30 min.
As you exit I-5 you pass through dozens of local family farms, with the freshest produce around.
We are surrounded by the snow peaked Cascade Mountains, with fabulous views from many angles.
This is the gateway for the scenic North Cascade Highway.
Mt. Baker ski resort is about 45 min away, for great exercising during the winter.
For nicer weather Mt. Pilchuck, a 15 min drive, offers miles of great trails and stunning views.
This city features a meandering river that many locals enjoy inner tubing down, on a hot summer day.
View the eagles take nest all along the river or take your fishing poll down to the river to catch dinner.
Take the kids to the Kangaroo farm, where you can feed them right out of your hands.
You can also pet a variety of animals and kiss a lama (pucker up butter cup!!!)
This charming city offers a variety of activities such as festivals, parades, a carnival, outdoor movie nights, farmers markets, music in the park, art shows, car shows, plus much more.
Arlington is full of charming shops and cafes.
If you like quiet, country living, come down and check us out.
Minutes to Crown Distributing, Angel of the Winds Casino and Arlington Airport
